nodes.text: Dagg was a Kadas'sa'Nikto male Mandalorian who worked as a bounty hunter during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. In that time, he resided on the Sith capital of Dromund Kaas, working in the Mandalorian enclave in Kaas City, where he provided training to other bounty hunters. While in the enclave, Dagg wore a set of blue and white Mandalorian armor and carried a blaster pistol on his right hip and a flamethrower on his left wrist. The Nikto's armor could project a holographic screen from the right wrist. He had green skin, green eyes, and spoke Nikto.
Dagg first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a 2011 BioWare massively-multiplayer online roleplaying game. In the game, he serves as a class trainer for the Imperial bounty hunter class.
